Query.blackbox: select datetime(substr(timestamp,7,4)||'-'||substr(timestamp,4,2)||'-'||substr(timestamp,1,2) ||' '|| substr(timestamp,12,2)||':'|| substr(timestamp,15,2)||':'|| substr(timestamp,18,2)) as xAxis, Temperature as yAxisTemp, Humidity as yAxisHumid, brightness as yAxisBrightness, location as room, image from blackbox where xAxis IS NOT NULL and xAxis >= DATE('{}')
Query.wendy-king: select datetime(substr(timestamp,7,4)||'-'||substr(timestamp,4,2)||'-'||substr(timestamp,1,2) ||' '|| substr(timestamp,12,2)||':'|| substr(timestamp,15,2)||':'|| substr(timestamp,18,2)) as xAxis, Temperature as yAxisTemp, Humidity as yAxisHumid, brightness as yAxisBrightness,location as room, image from wendy_king where xAxis IS NOT NULL and xAxis >= DATE('{}')
